sentence.Network_en: The children are very tactile with warm, loving natures.
sentence.Network_cn: 小孩子说话时喜欢用上热烈、表达喜爱的肢体触碰。

sentence.Network_en: It was peopled by a fiercely independent race of peace-loving Buddhists.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里住着一个与世隔绝的种族，人们都是爱好和平的佛教徒。

sentence.Network_en: Work on the positive, creating beautiful, loving and fulfilling relationships.
sentence.Network_cn: 致力于好的方面，努力营造美好的、友爱的、令人满意的关系。

means.word_mean: 1. thriving in a relatively alkaline environment; (especially of plants requiring a pH above 7)

auth_sentence.content: Sam was a loving husband and a wonderful father.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sam was a loving husband and a wonderful father.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sam was a loving husband and a wonderful father.

auth_sentence.content: He will also be missed by loving dog Macey.
auth_sentence.res_content: He will also be missed by loving dog Macey.

auth_sentence.content: Pits are loving to some and terrifying to others.
